stale.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: bread or cake that is stale is no longer fresh or good to eat
stale.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: French bread goes stale  (=becomes stale) very quickly.
stale.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: air that is stale is not fresh or pleasant
stale.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Other marriages might go stale, but not theirs.
stale.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: if you get stale, you have no new ideas, interest, or energy, because you have been doing the same thing for too long
stale.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: If you stay in the job for more than ten years, you get stale.
He was becoming stale and running out of ideas.
